about_the_game:
One night a year, all cats on earth stand on their hind legs and beckon the moon to come closer. Shadowblighted, it pierces through the sky, freezing the world in a time warp of terror. Monsters from all kinds of cultures, folklores and movies are leaking from the common subconcious and into reality. It's up to the guardians of Gimmick Temple to save the world from this ghastly curse!


Your magical dice are brimming with potential: by sticking magical Gimmicks to their sides, you can make them cast a massive array of spells, from shooting bullets, to spawning bombs, or even summoning photorealistic bears! Tinker perfectly engineered systems with precise functions, or embrace chaos and go all out with wacky effects!


Hurl your hefty Gimmick dice at enemies, smack 'em around the battlefield, and weave through waves of evil monsters! Bounce around on monsters' heads, grab and throw friendly raccoon dogs, all the while avoiding dangerous bullets! Show those demons who's boss!


Start your journey in the temple you call home, then travel to all sorts of crazy interconnected worlds! Meet a colourful array of characters and shopkeepers, talk to everyone, and unfold the mystery of the Jabberwock, run after run, secret after secret! There's more to this world than meets the eye!

Good luck, Gimmiko!

name: GIMMIKO

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (2*1866) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GS (512 MB) or equivalent
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Use the disc drive as a cup holder for extra gaming snack efficiency.

short_description: Demons from the collective subconcious are leaking into reality. Save the world from the curse of the Jabberwock in this wacky dicebuilding twinstick action roguelite!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Ukrainian, Japanese
